document.docAuthor: Asenjo, Angélico, Irmler, Ulrich, Klimaszewski, Jan, Chandler, Donald S., Fierros-López, Hugo Eduardo & Vieira, Juliana S.
document.masterDocTitle: Staphylinidae (Insecta: Coleoptera) in Latin America: synopsis, annotated catalog, diversity and distribution

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Staphylinidae (Insecta: Coleoptera) in Latin America: synopsis, annotated catalog, diversity and distribution

subSubSection.paragraph:
68 species are known from and are restricted to South America.
Achilia insularis (Jeannel)
described from France was mislabeled.

Characters/Description: Raffray 1904a: 110 (characters in key as
Byraxis
), 113 (characters in key); Raffray 1908a: 193 (characters in key as
Byraxis

Sabella et al. 2017: 120
(charactes of

species group), 123 (characters of

group), 127 (characters of

group), 132 (characters of

Park et al. 1976: 57
(species of the West Indies).
Distribution. West Indies: Cuba, Guadeloupe, St. Vincent & Grenadines, Grenada. Central America: Mexico, Guatemala, Honduras, Nicaragua, Costa Rica, Panama.
